Lucario (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0447: Riolu
Pokémon
#0449: Hippopotas →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Lucario (TCG Pocket).

Lucario has been featured on 46 different cards since it debuted as one of the PCG-P Promotional cards of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Lucario cards are normally Fighting-type or Metal-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Lucario

Lucario
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
